# type

**Instance Property**

The type of the color object.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: NSColor.ColorType { get }
```

## Discussion

A color object’s type determines which of its methods and properties you may access. For example, if the type is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/ColorType/pattern], you may safely access the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColor/patternImage] property.

## Working with the color space

- **usingType(_:)**: Returns a version of the color object that is compatible with the specified color type.
- **NSColor.ColorType**: Constants that indicate the color’s type, and which methods may be called on the color object.
- **colorSpace**: The color space associated with the color.
- **NSColorSpaceName**: Constants that specify color space names.
